item.title: Macos Update Time via Ntpserver
item.description: How to update time via ntpserver Today, My MBP is out of power. I cannot surfing internet. and the brower tell me my time was wrong. Then I checked my time in my MBB, I’m back in time jan 1, 2018. Wow, I got extra whole year time! Majove update time 1 sudo sntp -sS time.asia.apple.com When you’re getting this error 1 2 kod_init_kod_db(): Cannot open KoD db file /var/db/ntp-kod: No such file or directory You can solved the problems with:
